scripts.build-local: cd apps/expo && npx eas build --platform android --local --profile production
scripts.build-local:preview: cd apps/expo && npx eas build --platform android --local --profile preview
scripts.build-local:dev: cd apps/expo && npx eas build --platform android --local --profile development
scripts.prebuild: cd apps/expo && expo prebuild && node scripts/fix-manifest.js
scripts.prebuild:clean: cd apps/expo && expo prebuild --clean && node scripts/fix-manifest.js
